text: Viktor Fedorovych Bilash (; 1893 â€“ 24 January 1938) was the Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Insurgent Army of Ukraine (RIAU) under Nestor Makhno. He became its commander in chief after Makhno went into exile. ==Works== * ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Executed people Category:Russian military people
